statements: SELECT * FROM tournament_results;
SELECT tournament_name, winner_team FROM tournament_results WHERE tournament_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tournament_results WHERE winner_team = 'Team A';
SELECT tournament_name, runner_up_team FROM tournament_results ORDER BY tournament_name ASC;
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name FROM tournament_results WHERE winner_team = 'Team B' OR runner_up_team = 'Team C';
SELECT * FROM tournament_results WHERE tournament_id = 1;
SELECT tournament_name, winner_team FROM tournament_results WHERE winner_team = 'Team A';
SELECT tournament_name, winner_team, runner_up_team FROM tournament_results WHERE runner_up_team = 'Team B';
SELECT tournament_name, winner_team, runner_up_team FROM tournament_results WHERE tournament_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM tournament_results ORDER BY tournament_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM tournament_results;
SELECT tournament_name, winner_team_id FROM tournament_results WHERE ranking > 3;
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name FROM tournament_results ORDER BY tournament_id DESC;
SELECT team_name, tournament_name FROM participating_teams JOIN tournament_results ON participating_teams.tournament_id = tournament_results.tournament_id;
SELECT team_name, tournament_name FROM participating_teams JOIN tournament_results ON participating_teams.tournament_id = tournament_results.tournament_id WHERE ranking < 5;
SELECT * FROM tournament_results WHERE ranking > 3 ORDER BY tournament_name DESC
SELECT tournament_name, winner_team_id, ranking FROM tournament_results WHERE winner_team_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT team_name FROM participating_teams WHERE tournament_id = 1 AND team_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT tournament_name, team_name FROM tournament_results JOIN participating_teams ON tournament_results.tournament_id = participating_teams.tournament_id
SELECT * FROM tournament_results WHERE ranking BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM rankings ORDER BY rank DESC;
SELECT team_name, points FROM rankings WHERE points > 100;
SELECT tournament_name, prize_money FROM winners WHERE prize_money > 5000;
SELECT team_name, position FROM participating_teams WHERE tournament_name = 'Championship';
SELECT * FROM rankings ORDER BY points ASC, rank DESC;
SELECT * FROM rankings WHERE rank BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT team_name, points FROM rankings WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT tournament_name, prize_money FROM winners WHERE prize_money > 5000 ORDER BY prize_money DESC;
SELECT team_name, tournament_name, position FROM participating_teams WHERE position < 4 ORDER BY team_name ASC, position DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_teams, tournament_name FROM participating_teams WHERE tournament_name LIKE 'Summer%' GROUP BY tournament_name;
SELECT * FROM rankings;
SELECT team_name, country FROM teams;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournaments;
SELECT rank, team_id, total_points FROM rankings WHERE rank = 1;
SELECT winning_team_id, tournament_id FROM winners ORDER BY tournament_id DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, country FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_id, team_name, country FROM teams WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT rank, team_id, total_points FROM rankings WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT winner_id, tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM winners JOIN tournaments ON winners.tournament_id = tournaments.tournament_id;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date, winning_team_id FROM tournaments JOIN winners ON winning_team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT * FROM Rankings ORDER BY ranking DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM Teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT tournament_name FROM Tournaments WHERE tournament_id = 2;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM Teams WHERE team_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT tournament_id, COUNT(team_id) AS team_count FROM Participants GROUP BY tournament_id;
SELECT * FROM Rankings WHERE ranking > 5 ORDER BY tournament_id DESC, ranking ASC

SELECT Winners.tournament_id, Tournaments.tournament_name, Teams.team_name FROM Winners JOIN Tournaments ON Winners.tournament_id = Tournaments.tournament_id JOIN Teams ON Winners.winner_id = Teams.team_id
SELECT tournament_id, team_id FROM Participants WHERE tournament_id = 1 AND team_id = 3
SELECT tournament_id, AVG(ranking) AS average_ranking FROM Rankings GROUP BY tournament_id HAVING AVG(ranking) > 8

SELECT Teams.team_name, COUNT(Participants.team_id) AS total_participations FROM Teams LEFT JOIN Participants ON Teams.team_id = Participants.team_id GROUP BY Teams.team_name ORDER BY total_participations DESC
